name: Limb Reattacher
description: Heals severe wounds or trauma on a limb. Reattaches severed limbs, encourages mending and removes infection. Treatment induces an artificial coma for 1D days, and injects the patient with a cocktail of tailored regrowth drugs and nutrients (one dose per treatment).

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
